body_html:
@ysuematsu can you provide some more detailed examples?

If you have any more extensive examples you could put them in docs_src/api_guides

api_guides are automatically linked to by any api-pages for python objects they mention.

But we would welcome examples from anyone.

body:
@ysuematsu can you provide some more detailed examples? 

If you have any more extensive examples you could put them in [docs_src/api_guides](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/docs_src/api_guides/python) 

api_guides are automatically linked to by any api-pages for python objects they mention.

But we would welcome examples from anyone.
